revtext: I got Christina wig from wig-o-mania , it helps me in dressing up my hair....so easy...and the quality is superb and the clips are so good that it never hurts or pull my hair...amazing job they are doing for especially cancer patient\'s...hat\'s off wig-o-mania.
revreply: Hey Youvapriya, we are thrilled to hear from you and well noted that our Japanese Synthetic fibre product has helped you. We believe in ensuring enhanced end user experience and our products are made accordingly. Do visit us again to see our latest hair pieces.
